Message:
Before setting out, I conquered
Lord Samyaza’s seven trials,
and was chosen to wield
the shining holy sword, Caladbolg.

I was the protector who’d
cut down evil with swift justice.

And yet, Caladbolg never
once shone as it should...
Bonds are the source of strength.

I’ve always been told I was
too serious about rules, though,
and never got along with others.

But, rules exist to be followed.
I know I’m not in the wrong!

For an outsider like me,
bonds are...

“You’re always there for us
when we need you, Artoria.”

That’s what the Hero of the Staff
told me as those worries were
running through my mind.

“It’s because of how
reliable you are,
that we can relax
and have fun.”

...Wait, having fun is the last
thing I want you all to do...

But, you’ve actually been
watching me, Great Hero...

Even if Caladbolg doesn’t
accept me, if I can do
anything for you, I...

The next day,
a beautiful light started
shining from the holy sword.
